description:
Once a year, the master holds a mandatory 24-hour long road race for all the members of Fairy Tail. Jet seems to be a shoe-in to take the victory again this year, but the real competition is making sure not to come in last, because that wizard must face an unspeakable punishment from the master himself! For this day only, the Fairy Tail Wizards aren`t allies, but bitter rivals!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Les vingt quatre heures à pied de Fairy Tail
